00040 #ifndef _quaternion_h
00041 #define _quaternion_h
00042 
00043 #include "datatypes.h"
00044 
00045 class btQuaternion;
00046 namespace Ogre
00047 {
00048     class Quaternion;
00049 }
00050 
00051 namespace phys
00052 {
00053     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054     /// @class Quaternion
00055     /// @headerfile quaternion.h
00056     /// @brief This is used to store information about rotation in 3d space
00057     /// @details This is used to store information about rotation in 3d space. The
00058     /// X, Y and Z are used to identify a ray from the origin (0,0,0), about which
00059     /// W represents an amount of rotation.
00060     /// @warning The Documentation for this class needs to be revised. It describes 2 mutually exclusive means of storing
00061     class Quaternion
00062     {
00063         private:
00064             /// @brief Rotation on the X Axis.
00065             Real X;
00066             /// @brief Rotation on the Y Axis.
00067             Real Y;
00068             /// @brief Rotation on the Z Axis.
00069             Real Z;
00070             /// @brief Rotation on the W Axis.
00071             Real W;
00072 
00073         public:
00074             /// @brief Blank Constructor.
00075             /// @details Basic no-initialization constructor.
00076             Quaternion();
00077 
00078             /// @brief Constructor.
00079             /// @details Constructor that sets all four axis' of rotation.
00080             /// @param x Rotation on the X Axis.
00081             /// @param y Rotation on the Y Axis.
00082             /// @param z Rotation on the Z Axis.
00083             /// @param w Rotation on the W Axis.
00084             Quaternion(const Real &x, const Real &y, const Real &z, const Real &w);
00085 
00086             /// @brief Gets a Bullet quaternion.
00087             /// @details Creates a Bullet quaternion with values equal to this class and returns it.
00088             btQuaternion GetBulletQuaternion();
00089 
00090             /// @brief Copies an existing Bullet quaternion.
00091             /// @details This function will copy the values stored in an existing Bullet quaternion
00092             /// and set the values of this class to be the same.
00093             /// @param Ours The quaternion to be extracted.
00094             void ExtractBulletQuaternion(const btQuaternion &Ours);
00095 
00096             /// @brief Gets a Ogre quaternion.
00097             /// @details Creates a Ogre quaternion with values equal to this class and returns it.
00098             Ogre::Quaternion GetOgreQuaternion();
00099 
00100             /// @brief Copies an existing Ogre quaternion.
00101             /// @details This function will copy the values stored in an existing Ogre quaternion
00102             /// and set the values of this class to be the same.
00103             /// @param Ours The quaternion to be extracted.
00104             void ExtractOgreQuaternion(const Ogre::Quaternion &Ours);
00105     };
00106 }
00107 
00108 #endif
